info.name: System CJK Fonts Replacement - II
info.description: Replace default cjk fonts with Noto Sans Light Fonts or your choice.
info.additionalInfo: Noto Sans Light Fonts is here: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQAiIf4 . !important This version is for fonts have bold weight. If this style is not working, use https://userstyles.org/styles/115326/system-cjk-fonts-replacement instead. Generic family-name(sans-serif, serif, monospace) is not supported, but you can set them in browser's font settings.
